title: What makes the CES 2020 special? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A! CES 2020 is celebrating its 53rd year in 2020-it started way back in June 1967. the show runs from Jan 7 to Jan 10, 2020. Having run every year in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is the nation’s biggest and most important consumer technology show, it kicks-off the year’s product cycle for consumer tech in different categories, from TVs and headphones to laptops and even appliances.CES 2020 is special, as it is expected to host major announcements from the world’s highest-profile consumer technology companies, including Amazon, Facebook, Google, Microsoft, Samsung, and more.One important thing is that CES is a trade-only event. It is not open to the public. Only folks that are 18 years old or older, and affiliated with the consumer tech industry, are permitted to attend. Friends, family, and children under 18 connected or related to attendees are also permitted.At a top-level, you can see the products in a dozen major categories. CES is known to be a hub for advances in television technology, mobile computing, automotive, audio technology, appliances big and small, drones, virtual reality, smart home appliances, and more.Thanks Have a great day!
